entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
